result.arabic_text: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
result.translation: 69.Toysa mooniniiney xannabak orbisseenim kee seewak beyten Fida ottokommiya calaaliy meqeh anuk, Yallak meesita kay amri cintaanamak, diggah Yalli dambi cabti-li xuwawli. 70.Nabiyow seewak sin gabat yan maray Fida как beyteenik ixxic:Yalli sin lubbittet diggale iimaan yanim yeexegek Fidah siinik been maaluk kayrih taysem siinih aceeleeh dambi siinih cábele, Yalli dambi cabti-li xuwawli.
